duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide remarkable customer service through all customer interactions, problem resolution, telephone answering, safe deposit, etc.
Complete assigned daily planning activities and act as a digital ambassador to transition customers to digital solutions.
Resolve basic customer complaints and ensure compliance with applicable federal, state, and local laws and regulations.
Control and mitigate losses by following policies and procedures, and consistently impact the efforts that improve Banking Center Collaboration.

education_certification.credential: 6 months of Retail or financial sales experience OR 2 years of U.S. Military service OR 1 year of college
